mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO app_user (login_name, name, password, salt, user_type, mobile, birthday, status, sex
) VALUES ( #{loginName}, #{name}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{userType, javaType=cn.com.leyizhuang.app.core.constant.AppUserType, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, #{mobile}, #{birthday}, #{status}, #{sex, javaType=cn.com.leyizhuang.app.core.constant.SexType, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler} )
